00018 UINT8                               gubBuildingInfo[ WORLD_MAX ];
00019 BUILDING                      gBuildings[ MAX_BUILDINGS ];
00020 UINT8                               gubNumberOfBuildings;
00021 
00022 BUILDING * CreateNewBuilding( UINT8 * pubBuilding )
00023 {
00024       if (gubNumberOfBuildings + 1 >= MAX_BUILDINGS)
00025       {
00026             return( NULL );
00027       }
00028       // increment # of buildings
00029       gubNumberOfBuildings++;
00030       // clear entry
00031       gBuildings[ gubNumberOfBuildings ].ubNumClimbSpots = 0;
00032       *pubBuilding = gubNumberOfBuildings;
00033       // return pointer (have to subtract 1 since we just added 1
00034       return( &(gBuildings[ gubNumberOfBuildings ]) );
00035 }

00037 BUILDING * GenerateBuilding( INT16 sDesiredSpot )
00038 {
00039 
00040       UINT32      uiLoop;
00041       UINT32      uiLoop2;
00042       INT16       sTempGridNo, sNextTempGridNo, sVeryTemporaryGridNo;
00043       INT16       sStartGridNo, sCurrGridNo, sPrevGridNo = NOWHERE, sRightGridNo;
00044       INT8        bDirection, bTempDirection;
00045       BOOLEAN     fFoundDir, fFoundWall;
00046       UINT32      uiChanceIn = ROOF_LOCATION_CHANCE; // chance of a location being considered
00047       INT16       sWallGridNo;
00048       INT8        bDesiredOrientation;
00049       INT8        bSkipSpots = 0;
00050       SOLDIERTYPE       FakeSoldier;
00051       BUILDING *        pBuilding;
00052       UINT8                         ubBuildingID = 0;
00053       INT32                         iLoopCount = 0;
00054 
00055       pBuilding = CreateNewBuilding( &ubBuildingID );
00056       if (!pBuilding)
00057       {
00058             return( NULL );
00059       }
00060 
00061       // set up fake soldier for location testing
00062       memset( &FakeSoldier, 0, sizeof( SOLDIERTYPE ) );
00063       FakeSoldier.sGridNo = sDesiredSpot;
00064       FakeSoldier.bLevel = 1;
00065       FakeSoldier.bTeam = 1;
00066 
00067 #ifdef ROOF_DEBUG
00068       memset( gsCoverValue, 0x7F, sizeof( INT16 ) * WORLD_MAX );
00069 #endif
00070 
00071       // Set reachable 
00072       RoofReachableTest( sDesiredSpot, ubBuildingID );
00073 
00074       // From sGridNo, search until we find a spot that isn't part of the building
00075       bDirection = NORTHWEST;
00076       sTempGridNo = sDesiredSpot;
00077       // using diagonal directions to hopefully prevent picking a 
00078       // spot that 
00079       while( (gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE ) )
00080       {
00081             sNextTempGridNo = NewGridNo( sTempGridNo, DirectionInc( bDirection ) );
00082             if ( sTempGridNo == sNextTempGridNo )
00083             {
00084                   // hit edge of map!??!
00085                   return( NULL );
00086             }
00087             else
00088             {
00089                   sTempGridNo = sNextTempGridNo;
00090             }
00091       } 
00092 
00093       // we've got our spot
00094       sStartGridNo = sTempGridNo;
00095 
00096       sCurrGridNo = sStartGridNo;
00097       sVeryTemporaryGridNo = NewGridNo( sCurrGridNo, DirectionInc( EAST ) );
00098       if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sVeryTemporaryGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
00099       {
00100             // go north first
00101             bDirection = NORTH;
00102       }
00103       else
00104       {
00105             // go that way (east)
00106             bDirection = EAST;
00107       }
00108 
00109       gpWorldLevelData[ sStartGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] |= MAPELEMENT_EXT_ROOFCODE_VISITED;
00110 
00111       uiLoop2 = 0;
00112       while(uiLoop2 < WORLD_MAX)
00113       {
00114             // if point to (2 clockwise) is not part of building and is not visited,
00115             // or is starting point, turn!
00116             sRightGridNo = NewGridNo( sCurrGridNo, DirectionInc( gTwoCDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
00117             sTempGridNo = sRightGridNo;
00118             if ( ( ( !(gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE) && !(gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_ROOFCODE_VISITED) ) || (sTempGridNo == sStartGridNo) ) && (sCurrGridNo != sStartGridNo) )
00119             {
00120                   iLoopCount++;
00121 
00122                   if ( iLoopCount >= 10 )
00123                   {
00124                         return( NULL );
00125                   }
00126                   bDirection = gTwoCDirection[ bDirection ];
00127                   // try in that direction
00128                   continue;
00129             }
00130             iLoopCount = 0;
00131 
00132             // if spot ahead is part of building, turn
00133             sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( sCurrGridNo, DirectionInc( bDirection ) );
00134             if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE )
00135             {
00136                   // first search for a spot that is neither part of the building or visited
00137 
00138                   // we KNOW that the spot in the original direction is blocked, so only loop 3 times
00139                   bTempDirection = gTwoCDirection[ bDirection ];
00140                   fFoundDir = FALSE;
00141                   for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < 3; uiLoop++ )
00142                   {
00143                         sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( sCurrGridNo, DirectionInc( bTempDirection ) );
00144                         if ( !(gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE) && !(gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_ROOFCODE_VISITED) )
00145                         {
00146                               // this is the way to go!
00147                               fFoundDir = TRUE;
00148                               break;
00149                         }
00150                         bTempDirection = gTwoCDirection[ bTempDirection ];
00151                   }
00152                   if (!fFoundDir)
00153                   {
00154                         // now search for a spot that is just not part of the building
00155                         bTempDirection = gTwoCDirection[ bDirection ];
00156                         fFoundDir = FALSE;
00157                         for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < 3; uiLoop++ )
00158                         {
00159                               sTempGridNo = NewGridNo( sCurrGridNo, DirectionInc( bTempDirection ) );
00160                               if ( !(gpWorldLevelData[ sTempGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE) )
00161                               {
00162                                     // this is the way to go!
00163                                     fFoundDir = TRUE;
00164                                     break;
00165                               }
00166                               bTempDirection = gTwoCDirection[ bTempDirection ];
00167                         }
00168                         if (!fFoundDir)
00169                         {
00170                               // WTF is going on?
00171                               return( NULL );
00172                         }
00173                   }
00174                   bDirection = bTempDirection;
00175                   // try in that direction
00176                   continue;
00177             }
00178 
00179             // move ahead
00180             sPrevGridNo = sCurrGridNo;
00181             sCurrGridNo = sTempGridNo;
00182             sRightGridNo = NewGridNo( sCurrGridNo, DirectionInc( gTwoCDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
00183 
00184 #ifdef ROOF_DEBUG
00185             if (gsCoverValue[sCurrGridNo] == 0x7F7F)
00186             {
00187                   gsCoverValue[sCurrGridNo] = 1;
00188             }
00189             else if (gsCoverValue[sCurrGridNo] >= 0)
00190             {
00191                   gsCoverValue[sCurrGridNo]++;
00192             }
00193 
00194             DebugAI( String( "Roof code visits %d", sCurrGridNo ) );
00195 #endif
00196 
00197             if (sCurrGridNo == sStartGridNo)
00198             {
00199                   // done
00200                   break;
00201             }
00202 
00203             if ( !(gpWorldLevelData[ sCurrGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_ROOFCODE_VISITED) )
00204             {
00205                   gpWorldLevelData[ sCurrGridNo ].ubExtFlags[0] |= MAPELEMENT_EXT_ROOFCODE_VISITED;
00206 
00207                   gubBuildingInfo[ sCurrGridNo ] = ubBuildingID;
00208 
00209                   // consider this location as possible climb gridno          
00210                   // there must be a regular wall adjacent to this for us to consider it a 
00211                   // climb gridno
00212 
00213                   // if the direction is east or north, the wall would be in our gridno;
00214                   // if south or west, the wall would be in the gridno two clockwise
00215                   fFoundWall = FALSE;
00216 
00217                   switch( bDirection )
00218                   {
00219                         case NORTH:
00220                               sWallGridNo = sCurrGridNo;
00221                               bDesiredOrientation = OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT;
00222                               break;
00223                         case EAST:
00224                               sWallGridNo = sCurrGridNo;
00225                               bDesiredOrientation = OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT;
00226                               break;
00227                         case SOUTH:
00228                               sWallGridNo = (INT16) ( sCurrGridNo + DirectionInc( gTwoCDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
00229                               bDesiredOrientation = OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT;
00230                               break;
00231                         case WEST:
00232                               sWallGridNo = (INT16) ( sCurrGridNo + DirectionInc( gTwoCDirection[ bDirection ] ) );
00233                               bDesiredOrientation = OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT;
00234                               break;
00235                         default:
00236                               // what the heck?
00237                               return( NULL );
00238                   }
00239 
00240                   if (bDesiredOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT)
00241                   {
00242                         if (WallExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( sWallGridNo ))
00243                         {
00244                               fFoundWall = TRUE;
00245                         }
00246                   }
00247                   else 
00248                   {
00249                         if (WallExistsOfTopRightOrientation( sWallGridNo ))
00250                         {
00251                               fFoundWall = TRUE;
00252                         }
00253                   }
00254 
00255                   if (fFoundWall)
00256                   {
00257                         if (bSkipSpots > 0)
00258                         {
00259                               bSkipSpots--;
00260                         }
00261                         else if ( Random( uiChanceIn ) == 0 )
00262                         {           
00263                               // don't consider people as obstacles
00264                               if ( NewOKDestination( &FakeSoldier, sCurrGridNo, FALSE, 0 ) )
00265                               {
00266                                     pBuilding->sUpClimbSpots[ pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots ] = sCurrGridNo;
00267                                     pBuilding->sDownClimbSpots[ pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots ] = sRightGridNo;
00268                                     pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots++;
00269 
00270                                     if ( pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots == MAX_CLIMBSPOTS_PER_BUILDING)
00271                                     {
00272                                           // gotta stop!
00273                                           return( pBuilding );
00274                                     }
00275 
00276                                     // if location is added as a spot, reset uiChanceIn
00277                                     uiChanceIn = ROOF_LOCATION_CHANCE;
00278 #ifdef ROOF_DEBUG
00279                                     gsCoverValue[sCurrGridNo] = 99;
00280 #endif
00281                                     // skip the next spot
00282                                     bSkipSpots = 1;
00283                               }
00284                               else
00285                               {
00286                                     // if location is not added, 100% chance of handling next location
00287                                     // and the next until we can add one
00288                                     uiChanceIn = 1;                           
00289       
00290                               }
00291                         }
00292                         else
00293                         {
00294                               // didn't pick this location, so increase chance that next location 
00295                               // will be considered
00296                               if (uiChanceIn > 2)
00297                               {
00298                                     uiChanceIn--;
00299                               }
00300                         }
00301 
00302                   }
00303                   else
00304                   {
00305                         // can't select this spot
00306                         if ( (sPrevGridNo != NOWHERE) && (pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots > 0) )
00307                         {
00308                               if ( pBuilding->sDownClimbSpots[ pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots - 1 ] == sCurrGridNo )
00309                               {
00310                                     // unselect previous spot
00311                                     pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots--;
00312                                     // overwrote a selected spot so go into automatic selection for later
00313                                     uiChanceIn = 1;
00314 #ifdef ROOF_DEBUG
00315                                     // reset marker
00316                                     gsCoverValue[sPrevGridNo] = 1;
00317 #endif
00318                               }
00319                         }
00320 
00321                         // skip the next gridno
00322                         bSkipSpots = 1;
00323                   }
00324 
00325             }
00326             uiLoop2++;
00327       }
00328       // If we've run out of loop before we've run out of building, then there is
00329       // something that has gone pear shaped
00330       if(uiLoop2 >= WORLD_MAX)
00331       {
00332             UINT8 x = 0;
00333             UINT8 y = 0;
00334             while((sDesiredSpot - ((y + 1) * 160)) >= 0)
00335             {
00336                   y++;
00337             }
00338             x = sDesiredSpot - (y * 160);
00339             DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_2,String( "113/UC Warning! Building Walk Algorithm has covered the entire map! Building %d located at [%d,%d] must be bogus.", ubBuildingID, x, y ));
00340       }
00341 
00342 
00343       // at end could prune # of locations if there are too many
00344 
00345 /*
00346 #ifdef ROOF_DEBUG
00347       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00348       RenderWorld();
00349       RenderCoverDebug( );
00350       InvalidateScreen( );
00351       EndFrameBufferRender();
00352       RefreshScreen( NULL );
00353 #endif
00354 */
00355       return( pBuilding );
00356 }

00358 BUILDING * FindBuilding( INT16 sGridNo )
00359 {
00360       UINT8                         ubBuildingID;
00361       //UINT8                             ubRoomNo;
00362 
00363       if (sGridNo <= 0 || sGridNo > WORLD_MAX)
00364       {
00365             return( NULL );
00366       }
00367 
00368       // id 0 indicates no building
00369       ubBuildingID = gubBuildingInfo[ sGridNo ];
00370 
00371       if ( ubBuildingID == NO_BUILDING )
00372       {
00373             return( NULL );
00374             /*
00375             // need extra checks to see if is valid spot... 
00376             // must have valid room information and be a flat-roofed
00377             // building
00378             if ( InARoom( sGridNo, &ubRoomNo ) && (FindStructure( sGridNo, STRUCTURE_NORMAL_ROOF ) != NULL) )
00379             {
00380                   return( GenerateBuilding( sGridNo ) );
00381             }
00382             else
00383             {
00384                   return( NULL );
00385             }
00386             */
00387       }
00388       else if ( ubBuildingID > gubNumberOfBuildings ) // huh?
00389       {
00390             return( NULL );
00391       }
00392 
00393       return( &(gBuildings[ ubBuildingID ]) );
00394 }
00395 
00396 BOOLEAN InBuilding( INT16 sGridNo )
00397 {
00398       if ( FindBuilding( sGridNo ) == NULL )
00399       {
00400             return( FALSE );
00401       }
00402       return( TRUE );
00403 }

00405 
00406 void GenerateBuildings( void )
00407 {
00408       UINT32      uiLoop;
00409 
00410       // init building structures and variables
00411       memset( &gubBuildingInfo, 0, WORLD_MAX * sizeof( UINT8 ) );
00412       memset( &gBuildings, 0, MAX_BUILDINGS * sizeof( BUILDING ) );
00413       gubNumberOfBuildings = 0;
00414 
00415       if ( (gbWorldSectorZ > 0) || gfEditMode)
00416       {
00417             return;
00418       }
00419 
00420       // reset ALL reachable flags
00421       // do once before we start building generation for
00422       // whole map
00423       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < WORLD_MAX; uiLoop++ )
00424       {
00425             gpWorldLevelData[ uiLoop ].uiFlags &= ~(MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE);
00426             gpWorldLevelData[ uiLoop ].ubExtFlags[0] &= ~(MAPELEMENT_EXT_ROOFCODE_VISITED);
00427       }
00428 
00429       // search through world
00430       // for each location in a room try to find building info
00431       for ( uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < WORLD_MAX; uiLoop++ )
00432       {
00433             if ( (gubWorldRoomInfo[ uiLoop ] != NO_ROOM) && (gubBuildingInfo[ uiLoop ] == NO_BUILDING) && (FindStructure( (INT16) uiLoop, STRUCTURE_NORMAL_ROOF ) != NULL) )
00434             {
00435                   GenerateBuilding( (INT16) uiLoop );
00436             }
00437       }
00438 }
00439 
00440 INT16 FindClosestClimbPoint( INT16 sStartGridNo, INT16 sDesiredGridNo, BOOLEAN fClimbUp )
00441 {
00442       BUILDING *  pBuilding;
00443       UINT8                   ubNumClimbSpots;
00444       INT16 *                 psClimbSpots;
00445       UINT8                   ubLoop;
00446       INT16                   sDistance, sClosestDistance = 1000, sClosestSpot= NOWHERE;
00447 
00448       pBuilding = FindBuilding( sDesiredGridNo );
00449       if (!pBuilding)
00450       {
00451             return( NOWHERE );
00452       }
00453 
00454       ubNumClimbSpots = pBuilding->ubNumClimbSpots;
00455 
00456       if (fClimbUp)
00457       {
00458             psClimbSpots = pBuilding->sUpClimbSpots;
00459       }
00460       else
00461       {
00462             psClimbSpots = pBuilding->sDownClimbSpots;
00463       }
00464 
00465       for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < ubNumClimbSpots; ubLoop++ )
00466       {
00467             if ( (WhoIsThere2( pBuilding->sUpClimbSpots[ ubLoop ], 0 ) == NOBODY)
00468                   && (WhoIsThere2( pBuilding->sDownClimbSpots[ ubLoop ], 1 ) == NOBODY) )
00469             {
00470                   sDistance = PythSpacesAway( sStartGridNo, psClimbSpots[ ubLoop ] );
00471                   if (sDistance < sClosestDistance )
00472                   {
00473                         sClosestDistance = sDistance;
00474                         sClosestSpot = psClimbSpots[ ubLoop ];
00475                   }
00476             }
00477       }
00478 
00479       return( sClosestSpot );
00480 }
00481 
00482 BOOLEAN SameBuilding( INT16 sGridNo1, INT16 sGridNo2 )
00483 {
00484       if ( gubBuildingInfo[ sGridNo1 ] == NO_BUILDING )
00485       {
00486             return( FALSE );
00487       }
00488       if ( gubBuildingInfo[ sGridNo2 ] == NO_BUILDING )
00489       {
00490             return( FALSE );
00491       }
00492       return( (BOOLEAN) (gubBuildingInfo[ sGridNo1] == gubBuildingInfo[ sGridNo2 ]) );
00493 }
